review: Dr. Venugopal is a very humble, efficient, responsible, & compassionate health care professional. He was diligent in diagnosing an important & critical condition of my 11 year old daughter which was almost ruled out as non existent issue by many doctors. She was limping due to weakness in bone which if not treated could have been difficult. He demonstrated similar diligence in diagnosing and treating my father.

Hi I had very severe left side upper back pain and shoulder area everyday in myself last 6 years and many treatments undergone with many doctorâ€™s. He has diagnosed the actual problem and provided me the right advice with good treatment. 

The best part is he had provided the best  treatment to prevention of the pain to avoid aggravated level in future. 
Doctor is very friendly and understanding the patient needs as very good human being with lot of humbleness.

** ** * **** **** ******* I have been consulting this doctor since 2013. Doctor behaviour was good. I was visited for slip disk treatment. I am satisfied with doctor treatment, there was not much waiting time to consult the doctor. When it comes to improvement everything was good. I would like to recommend this doctor to others.
